```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r package}

library(readr)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(themes360info)

```

```{r readdata}

hdi <- read_excel("data/healtheconomics/hdi.xlsx")

whr <- read_excel("data/healtheconomics/wellbeing-otherfactos.xls")

whr <- whr %>% 
  clean_names()

hdi <- hdi %>% 
  clean_names()

whr <- whr %>% 
  mutate(score = life_ladder/10)

combined <- whr %>% 
  left_join(hdi, by = c("country_name" = "country"))

final <- combined %>% 
  select(country_name, year, score,)

```
